p: During Cycles 2 and 3, all three Rolontis dose groups met the criterion for noninferiority to the pegfilgrastim group (Table 2), as the upper limit of the 95% CI for the differences from the pegfilgrastim group was <1 day. During Cycle 4, the noninferiority criterion was met in the 135 μg/kg ( P < 0.001) and 270 μg/kg ( P < 0.001) Rolontis groups, but not the 45 μg/kg Rolontis group ( P = 0.781).
